insertStringsInOutputStream

public static byte[] insertStringsInOutputStream(java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream baos,
                                                 java.util.Hashtable tagMappings)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
This method takes a ByteArrayOutputStream and return a byte[] that contains the ByteArrayOutputStream content after modifying it by replacing tags embedded in the ByteArray with strings passed in tagMappings. This method searches for tag markers << ... >> in the ByteArray to define the beginning and end of a tag to be replaced.
For example, the text 'This is the <>' contains one tag [dDocTitle]. Assuming the tagMapping of dDocTitle to DOCUMENT TITLE the text would be replaced by 'This is the DOCUMENT TITLE '.

Parameters:
baos - ByteArrayOutputStream on which replacements should be made
tagMappings - Hashtable containing the tag to string mappings
Returns:
byte[] Byte array of baos with the tags replaced
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

insertStringsInOutputStream

public static byte[] insertStringsInOutputStream(java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream baos,
                                                 java.lang.String tagPrefix,
                                                 java.lang.String tagSuffix,
                                                 java.util.Hashtable tagMappings)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
This method takes a ByteArrayOutputStream and return a byte[] that contains the ByteArrayOutputStream content after modifying it by replacing tags embedded in the ByteArray with strings passed in tagMappings. Use this method to specify the tagPrefix and tagSuffix which wrap the tags in the ByteStream.

Parameters:
baos - ByteArrayOutputStream on which replacements should be made
tagPrefix - The prefix identifying the start of a replacement tag
tagSuffix - The suffix identifying the end of a replacement tag
tagMappings - Hashtable containing the tag to string mappings
Returns:
byte[] Byte array of baos with the tags replaced
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
